flawed_nl_solution:
For the night he was able to intake 110 + 310 + 215 = <<110+310+215=653>>653 calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake 560 + 780 = <<560+780=1340>>1340 calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake 1340 + 653 = <<1340+653=1993>>1993 calories
Therefore, he can still intake 2500 - 1993 = <<507=507>>507 calories.
#### 507

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 635, not 653. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
